./src/web/manager/components/FlowsPage.t.description: Implemented exponential backoff polling mechanism for API calls. Uses dynamic setTimeout-based polling instead of fixed setInterval. On success, resets retry count and polls every 30 seconds. On error, increases delay exponentially: 5s → 10s → 20s. Stops after 3 failed attempts. Properly cleans up timeout in useEffect cleanup function to prevent memory leaks.
